Raynor.description: Jim Raynor deploys a versatile Terran army with powerful orbital command calldowns.

1.name: Rough Rider
1.description: Dusk Wings cooldown reduced to 3 minutes. Can deploy anywhere on the map. Dusk Wings uses 6 weaker Banshees.
1.playstyle: Aggressive early game with frequent air strikes

2.name: Backwater Sheriff
2.description: Hyperion cooldown reduced to 3 minutes. Can be deployed anywhere. Hyperion has -50% health and attack speed.

3.name: Lawbringer
3.description: Spider Mines are free and unlimited. Vultures cost +50% minerals.
3.playstyle: Heavy mine-based defense and area denial

power_spikes.mid: Maxed bio army with Medic support

tips.early: Use Scanner Sweep and MULE drops liberally - they're free!
tips.mid: Keep Marines and Medics together for maximum sustainability
tips.late: Save Hyperion and Battlecruiser calldowns for tough objectives

Kerrigan.description: Sarah Kerrigan is a powerful hero unit supported by Zerg forces.

1.name: Folly of Man
1.description: Kerrigan can use abilities without energy costs. Kerrigan cannot regenerate life or energy and starts at level 1.
1.playstyle: Glass cannon Kerrigan with unlimited abilities

2.name: Malignant Creep
2.description: Creep provides +50% attack speed and +2 armor. Structures cannot spread creep and Kerrigan cannot place Omega Worms.

3.name: Desolate Queen
3.description: Kerrigan starts at level 70. All other units cost double and build 100% slower.

power_spikes.early: Kerrigan at level 5 with Kinetic Blast
power_spikes.mid: Kerrigan max level with Ultralisk support

tips.early: Level Kerrigan by killing enemy units - prioritize combat
tips.mid: Use Omega Worms for backdoor attacks on objectives
tips.late: Immobilization Wave is excellent for defense and attack waves

Artanis.description: Artanis commands the Protoss forces with powerful support abilities.

0.name: Standard
0.description: Balanced Protoss army with orbital strikes

1.name: Valorous Inspirator
1.description: Guardian Shell grants +100% attack speed. Guardian Shell cooldown increased by 60 seconds.

2.name: Nexus Legate
2.description: Orbital Assimilators grant +4 gas income. Start with 3 Orbital Assimilators. Cannot train Probes.
2.playstyle: No probe economy, pure gas focus

3.name: Arkship Commandant
3.description: All army units warp in via the Spear of Adun for free. Supply Depots cost +100% and provide +2 supply.
3.playstyle: Free unit warps with heavy supply investment

power_spikes.mid: Mass Dragoons with recall for mobility
power_spikes.late: Unlimited free unit warp-ins across map

tips.early: Use Solar Bombardment to clear early attack waves
tips.mid: Dragoons are very cost-effective - mass them
tips.late: Save recall for emergency escapes or reinforcements

Swann.description: Rory Swann specializes in mechanical units and defensive structures.

1.name: Heavy Weapons Specialist
1.description: Laser Drill gains +5 range and attacks 30% faster. Cannot build Flaming Betties or Missile Turrets.

2.name: Grease Monkey
2.description: Combat units heal to full after not taking damage. Immortality Protocol cooldown increased by 60 seconds.

3.name: Heavy Industry
3.description: Factory Units gain +2 armor and +25% life. Can construct 2 units simultaneously. Gas Harvesters cost +25 minerals.

power_spikes.mid: Mass Goliaths with Science Vessel support

tips.late: Position Laser Drill for maximum objective coverage

Zagara.description: Zagara focuses on overwhelming enemies with expendable Zerg forces.

0.name: Standard
0.description: Free Zerg units with timed life

1.name: Scourge Queen
1.description: Zagara can summon Scourge with new ability. Zagara cannot use Baneling Barrage.

2.name: Mother of Constructs
2.description: Roach and Hydralisk variants attack 50% faster. Cannot use Infested Drop and Hunter Killer calldowns.

3.name: Apex Predator
3.description: Zagara gains +100% attack speed and can use all abilities without cooldown. Cannot use calldowns or train army units.

power_spikes.late: Sustained pressure with free unit spawns

tips.early: Expand aggressively - you get free units anyway
tips.mid: Use Roach Drop for backdoor attacks
tips.late: Aberrations tank while free units deal damage

Vorazun.description: Matriarch Vorazun uses stealth and shadows to confuse enemies.

0.name: Standard
0.description: Balanced dark templar and shadow army

1.name: Withering Siphon
1.description: Dark Pylons provide +15% attack speed per pylon. Dark Pylons cost +50% and cannot cloak or grant vision.

2.name: Keeper of Shadows
2.description: Shadow Guard duration increased by 100%. Shadow Guard units deal -40% damage.

3.name: Withering Terror
3.description: Vorazun gains Fear ability. Black Hole cooldown increased by 120 seconds.

power_spikes.mid: Time Stop for attack wave defense

tips.early: Use Dark Templars for early enemy harassment
tips.mid: Time Stop is amazing for defense and objectives
tips.late: Dark Archons' mind control can turn enemy units

Karax.description: Phase-smith Karax excels at building powerful structures and supporting allies.

1.name: Architect of War
1.description: Chrono Wave affects all structures globally. Chrono Wave grants +100% attack/production speed instead of +50%.

2.name: Solarite Celestial
2.description: Spear of Adun abilities cost 0 Solarite but have +100% cooldown. Start with 0 Solarite and cannot gain Solarite.

3.name: Templar Apparent
3.description: Can build and manage 50 more structures. Structures cost +50% and build 50% slower.

power_spikes.late: Orbital Strikes and repair beam dominate

tips.mid: Use Chrono Wave before attack waves
tips.late: Repair Beam keeps structures and allies alive

Abathur.description: Abathur creates the ultimate Zerg through evolution and biomass collection.

1.name: Essence Hoarder
1.description: Biomass abilities can store more stacks. Toxic Nest spawns 4 additional Roachlings per stack. Roachlings life duration and cost increased.

2.name: Evolutionary Abomination
2.description: Ultimate Evolutions gain +1000 life and +5 armor. Ultimate Evolutions respawn timer increased by 100%.

3.name: Bone Appetite
3.description: Units and structures can be consumed for 50 biomass. Consuming units and structures costs 50 biomass.

wave_2.composition: Mixed army with some heavy units
